infos.value: In War of the Gale Highlands, many nations, such as Rundall, Heindler, and Ovis, will take the center stage.
I hope you will take the time to learn about what has transpired in each of these nations and about their relationship with King Mont.

• Story Quest Unlock •
Story Quest — Part 2 has been unlocked.

• Part Select •
You can switch between Parts on the Part Select screen.

• Switching Between Parts •
Even if you're progressing through Part 2, you can continue from where you left off with the previous quests by switching back to Part 1.
Would you like to hear the explanation for unlocking Story Quests?
